news.title: Google Ads for Lawyers: A Beginners Guide to PPC Success
news.description: Google Ads is the most popular PPC advertising platform in the world. While most legal professionals have an idea of what PPC advertising is, many believe outdated PPC wisdom or are hesitant to give it a try. Check out this post to dispel some common myths and get beginner's PPC tips for your practice.

news.title: Effective Digital & Traditional Marketing for Small Law Firms
news.description: Lawyers can learn about effective marketing strategies for small law firms with David Alan Wolf, Partner at Wood, Atter & Wolf P.A. in this recent Justia Webinar.

news.title: Justia Legal Guides: Car Accidents Center
news.description: When a driver takes their eyes off the road for even a few seconds, the consequences can be catastrophic. The Justia Car Accidents Center provides guidance to victims of distracted driving accidents and other crashes.

news.title: Justia Legal Guides: Tax Law Center
news.description: There’s a reason why an industry has evolved to help people with their taxes. The laws don’t make much sense to the average person. Justia aims to take some of the mystery out of the process with the Justia Tax Law Center.
